r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Show individual package version in --version. (Hannes) - Fixed bug#54217 Warn about nonexisting parameters. (Moacir) - Fixed bug#50725 Generate nav links at top of function index (Peter Cowburn) - Fixed bug#47392 Option to specify filename for bightmls. (Hannes)
